CmdLine: pip install         conan==0.12.0     && conan user     && conan --version     && sed -i.bak '/^path:\s/s#~/.conan/data#/tmp/conan#' ~/.conan/conan.conf     && sed -i.bak2 '/^compiler.libcxx=/s#libstdc++#libstdc++11#' ~/.conan/conan.conf     && rm ~/.conan/conan.conf.ba*
